==IB API==
{{{
protected String readStr() throws IOException {
  StringBuffer buf = new StringBuffer();
  while (true) {
    byte c = m_dis.readByte();
    if (c == 0) {
      break;
    }
    buf.append((char) c);
  }

  String str = buf.toString();
  return str.length() == 0 ? null : str;
}
